keyword: how many calories in one oreo
title: How Many Calories in One Oreo?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in one oreo, including carbs, fat, protein, and full nutrition breakdown for this classic cookie.
h1: How Many Calories in One Oreo?
assumptions: Standard Oreo cookie (original chocolate sandwich, ~11 g), no fillings or variations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, exact size, and recipe changes. Check packaging for precise values.

quick_answer.text: One standard Oreo cookie contains about 53 calories.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one oreo cookie?
What are the carbs in one oreo?
faqs.a: About 7.3 g total carbs, including 0.4 g fiber and 3.9 g sugars.
Yes, roughly 0.7 g protein per cookie.

faqs.q: How much fat is in one oreo?
faqs.a: 2.5 g total fat, with 0.4 g saturated fat and 0 g trans fat.
No cholesterol (0 mg) in a standard Oreo cookie.
